00039 const simsignalwrap_t ChannelAccess::mobilityStateChangedSignal = simsignalwrap_t(MIXIM_SIGNAL_MOBILITY_CHANGE_NAME);
00040 
00041 BaseConnectionManager* ChannelAccess::getConnectionManager(const cModule* nic)
00042 {
00043   std::string cmName = nic->hasPar("connectionManagerName")
00044              ? nic->par("connectionManagerName").stringValue()
00045              : "";
00046   if (cmName != ""){
00047     cModule* ccModule = simulation.getModuleByPath(cmName.c_str());
00048 
00049     return dynamic_cast<BaseConnectionManager *>(ccModule);
00050   }
00051   else {
00052     return FindModule<BaseConnectionManager *>::findGlobalModule();
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void ChannelAccess::initialize( int stage )
00057 {
00058   BatteryAccess::initialize(stage);
00059 
00060     if( stage == 0 ){
00061         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00062 
00063         findHost()->subscribe(mobilityStateChangedSignal, this);
00064 
00065         cc = getConnectionManager(getNic());
00066         if( cc == NULL ) error("Could not find connectionmanager module");
00067         isRegistered = false;
00068     }
00069 
00070     usePropagationDelay = par("usePropagationDelay");
00071 }

00074 
00075 void ChannelAccess::sendToChannel(cPacket *msg)
00076 {
00077     const NicEntry::GateList& gateList = cc->getGateList( getNic()->getId());
00078     NicEntry::GateList::const_iterator i = gateList.begin();
00079 
00080     if(useSendDirect){
00081         // use Andras stuff
00082         if( i != gateList.end() ){
00083           simtime_t delay = SIMTIME_ZERO;
00084             for(; i != --gateList.end(); ++i){
00085               //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00086               delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00087 
00088                 int radioStart = i->second->getId();
00089                 int radioEnd = radioStart + i->second->size();
00090                 for (int g = radioStart; g != radioEnd; ++g)
00091                     sendDirect(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00092                                delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), g);
00093             }
00094             //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00095       delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00096 
00097             int radioStart = i->second->getId();
00098             int radioEnd = radioStart + i->second->size();
00099             for (int g = radioStart; g != --radioEnd; ++g)
00100                 sendDirect(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00101                            delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), g);
00102 
00103             sendDirect(msg, delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), radioEnd);
00104         }
00105         else{
00106             coreEV << "Nic is not connected to any gates!" << endl;
00107             delete msg;
00108         }
00109     }
00110     else{
00111         // use our stuff
00112         coreEV <<"sendToChannel: sending to gates\n";
00113         if( i != gateList.end() ){
00114           simtime_t delay = SIMTIME_ZERO;
00115             for(; i != --gateList.end(); ++i){
00116               //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00117         delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00118 
00119                 sendDelayed( static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00120                              delay, i->second );
00121             }
00122             //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00123       delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00124 
00125             sendDelayed( msg, delay, i->second );
00126         }
00127         else{
00128             coreEV << "Nic is not connected to any gates!" << endl;
00129             delete msg;
00130         }
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 simtime_t ChannelAccess::calculatePropagationDelay(const NicEntry* nic) {
00135   if(!usePropagationDelay)
00136     return 0;
00137 
00138   ChannelAccess *const senderModule   = this;
00139   ChannelAccess *const receiverModule = nic->chAccess;
00140   //const simtime_t_cref sStart         = simTime();
00141 
00142   assert(senderModule); assert(receiverModule);
00143 
00145   Coord           sendersPos  = senderModule->getMobilityModule()->getCurrentPosition(/*sStart*/);
00146   Coord           receiverPos = receiverModule->getMobilityModule()->getCurrentPosition(/*sStart*/);
00147 
00148   // this time-point is used to calculate the distance between sending and receiving host
00149   return receiverPos.distance(sendersPos) / BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void ChannelAccess::receiveSignal(cComponent */*source*/, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj)
00153 {
00154     if(signalID == mobilityStateChangedSignal) {
00155       ChannelMobilityPtrType const mobility = check_and_cast<ChannelMobilityPtrType>(obj);
00156         Coord                        pos      = mobility->getCurrentPosition();
00157 
00158         if(isRegistered) {
00159             cc->updateNicPos(getNic()->getId(), &pos);
00160         }
00161         else {
00162             // register the nic with ConnectionManager
00163             // returns true, if sendDirect is used
00164             useSendDirect = cc->registerNic(getNic(), this, &pos);
00165             isRegistered  = true;
00166         }
00167     }
00168 }
